item.title: In Plain Sight | Wellcome Collection
item.description: I love the Wellcome Collection! Not only does it host the best museum shop in London hands down, its exhibitions are so entertaining - imaginative grab bags of interesting things, based loosely around a single theme. I also feel a bit defensive of it as an institution, given the silly “anti-woke” media fracas it faced recently when it announced plans to update its permanent collection display. Anyway, following recent shows on themes like electricity, games and (my favourite) teeth, itâ€™s the turn of sight.
